articles.title: Celine Dion excluded from Rolling Stone's best singers list and her fans are not happy - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Jungkook from BTS did, however, make the publication's list of the 200 Greatest Singers of All Time. He's at No 191. The rest of the band – RM, V, Jimin, J-hope, Suga and Jin – did not make the cut.
articles.content:
The publication did try to manage expectations and possibly placate the expected outrage in its introduction to the story.
